member.summary: Method invoked whenever application code or internal processes call ApplyTemplate.

member.summary: Method invoked whenever the mouse is moved over the control.

member.summary: Redraw all visual elements related to chart axes, including the cube which surrounds the chart.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.CrosshairRamp
member.summary: The Brush which, when overlaid upon the series mesh, will represent the Z-crosshair.

member.summary: Identifies the CrosshairAxes dependency property.

member.summary: Identifies the TooltipTemplate dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.ToolTipTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets DataTemplate to use for the appearance of the chart tooltip.
member.remarks: The runtime DataContext for this DataTemplate will be a SurfaceChartToolTipDataContext object containing Location information about the current mouse point.

member.summary: Identifies the TooltipVisibility dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.ToolTipVisibility
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to show tooltip when a user hovers over the series surface.

member.summary: Event raised when the mouse is moved over the series mesh.

member.summary: Event raised when the mouse button is raised after being depressed over the series mesh.

member.summary: Event raised when the mouse button is depressed over a point marker.

member.summary: Event raised when the mouse is moved over a point marker.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.RimThicknessProperty
member.summary: Identifies the RimThickness dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.RimThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets thickness of the rim or ridge surrounding the chart's background cube.
member.remarks: This is a value between 0 and 1, relative to the size of the entire cube. The value will also be scaled according to aspect ratio, in order to achieve a consistent size for all sides of the cube, regardless of aspect ratio.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.LogicalChildren
member.summary: Gets logical children in this control.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.ToolTipHorizontalOffsetProperty
member.summary: Identifies the ToolTipHorizontalOffset dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.ToolTipHorizontalOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets horizontal offset for the chart's tooltip

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.ToolTipVerticalOffsetProperty
member.summary: Identifies the ToolTipVerticalOffset dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.ToolTipVerticalOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets vertical offset for the chart's tooltip

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.ActualAspectProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.ActualAspect
member.summary: Gets current aspect ratio of the surface chart, calculated from the setting of the Aspect property and/or the actual size of the control.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.ActualXAxisProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.ActualXAxis
member.summary: Gets the X-axis being used by this chart.
member.remarks: This property will return the value of the XAxis property. If the XAxis property is not set, it will return the Axis object being used as the default X-axis.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.ActualYAxisProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.ActualYAxis
member.summary: Gets the Y-axis being used by this chart.
member.remarks: This property will return the value of the YAxis property. If the YAxis property is not set, it will return the Axis object being used as the default Y-axis.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.ActualZAxisProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.ActualZAxis
member.summary: Gets the Z-axis being used by this chart.
member.remarks: This property will return the value of the ZAxis property. If the ZAxis property is not set, it will return the Axis object being used as the default Z-axis.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.AspectProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.Aspect
member.summary: Gets or sets 3-dimensional vector specifying the aspect ratio of X, Y, and Z dimensions in the the surface chart.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.CrosshairBrushProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.CrosshairBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the a brush used for rendering crosshair lines

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.CrosshairThicknessProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.CrosshairThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the thickness for rendering crosshair lines.
member.remarks: This is a value relative to the size of the surface chart.

member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.CubeMaterial
member.summary: Gets or sets the material for rendering cube sides

member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.ItemsSource
member.summary: Gets or sets items source for the surface chart.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.LightDirectionProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.LightDirection
member.summary: Gets or sets 3-dimensional vector specifying the direction of a directional light which lights the series surface and surface projection on the floor of chart cube.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.LightIntensityProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.LightIntensity
member.summary: Gets or sets the lighting intensity for the series surface and surface projection on the floor of chart cube.
member.remarks: Valid values for this property are between 0 and 1

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.PerspectiveProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.Perspective
member.summary: Gets or sets the perspective for this chart.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.RotationProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.Rotation
member.summary: Gets or sets the rotation for the surface chart.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.ScaleProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.Scale
member.summary: Gets or sets the scale used for zooming the view in or out from the surface chart.
member.remarks: This is a value relative to the size of the control. A value of 1 would cause the surface cube to occupy 100% of the space available in the control.

member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.XAxis

member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.YAxis
member.summary: Gets or sets the Y axis for the surface chart.

member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamChart3D.ZAxis
member.summary: Gets or sets the Z axis for the surface chart.

member.summary: Used to invoke the event.
member.param: The name of the property that was changed

member.summary: Event raised when certain properties are changed on this 3-dimensional chart.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D
member.summary: Control class for plotting 3D (XYZ) scatter data as a surface chart.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.OnApplyTemplate
member.summary: Method invoked whenever application code or internal processes call ApplyTemplate.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.Pick(System.Windows.Point)
member.summary: Returns a SurfaceChart3DMouseHit object, when applicable, given a particualr mouse position.
member.returns: A SurfaceChart3DMouseHit object containing contextual information about the surface chart with respect to the given mouse position.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.RefreshChartTransform
member.summary: Refresh the 3D position of the chart and markers.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.OnPropertyUpdated(System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Method called when certain properties are changed on this XamScatterSurface3D object.
member.remarks: This method will raise the PropertyChanged event.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.PointMarkerTemplateProperty
member.summary: Identifies the PointMarkerTemplate dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.PointMarkerTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets DataTemplate used for rendering data point markers.
member.remarks: This DataTemplate is not required. When set, the MarkerMaterial should have the Viewport2DVisual3D.IsVisualHostMaterial attached property set to True; otherwise, the DataTemplate will not be visible.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.PointMarkerMeshProperty
member.summary: Identifies the PointMarkerMesh dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.PointMarkerMesh
member.summary: Gets or sets 3-dimensional mesh geometry used for representing shape of data point markers.
member.remarks: The coordinate system to use in this mesh is a cube sized equally to the chart, ranging from 0 to 1 in all 3 directions.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.PointMarkerMaterialProperty
member.summary: Identifies the PointMarkerMaterial dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.PointMarkerMaterial
member.summary: Gets or sets material used for rendering the data point markers.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.ShowPointMarkersProperty
member.summary: Identifies the ShowPointMarkers dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.ShowPointMarkers
member.summary: Gets or sets the whether to show markers on the series surface.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.ExportVisualData
member.summary: Exports visual data representing current state of the surface chart
member.remarks: This value can be used for testing of the surface chart

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.RefreshContourRamp
member.summary: Redraw the Z-crosshair, which is overlaid upon the series mesh.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.#ctor
member.summary: ScatterSurface3D constructor.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.ActualSeriesMaterialProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.ActualSeriesMaterial
member.summary: Gets actual series material used in the series mesh.
member.remarks: This property will return a Material which is a composite of the SeriesMaterial or SeriesColors, along with some default materials applied by the surface chart.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.FloorMaterialProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.FloorMaterial
member.summary: Gets or sets material to use for the 3-dimensional model projected onto the floor of the surface chart at the minimum of Z axis.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.NormalizeTriangulationProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.NormalizeTriangulation
member.summary: Determines whether to normalize XY values before sending them to triangulation.
member.remarks: XY values with dissimilar magnitude can have an undesirable effect on triangulation. Set this property to true to normalize all x and y values using the formula (x(i) - xMin) / (xMax - xMin).

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.SamplingThresholdProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.SamplingThreshold
member.summary:
Gets or sets the maximum points which the surface chart will allow to render in the series mesh.
If the count of items in the ItemsSource exceeds MaximumPoints, then sampling will be turned on, and the points will be consolidated into a regular grid with Sqrt(MaximumPoints) rows and Sqrt(MaximumPoints) columns.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.SeriesColorInterpolationProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.SeriesColorInterpolation
member.summary: Gets or sets mode for selecting colors from the SeriesColors.
member.remarks: Note color interpolation is not used if SeriesMaterial is specified on this control

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.SeriesColorsProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.SeriesColors
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of colors to use in coloring series surface of the chart.
member.remarks: Note that SeriesColors are not used if SeriesMaterial is specified on this control

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.SeriesMaterialProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.SeriesMaterial
member.summary: Gets or sets material used for rendering the series mesh.
member.remarks: Note that SeriesMaterial takes precedence over value specified in SeriesColors

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.ShininessProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.Shininess
member.summary: Gets or sets the shininess for the series surface.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.ShowFloorProjectionProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.ShowFloorProjection
member.summary: Gets or sets the whether or not to show a 2-dimensional projection of the series mesh on the floor of the cube, at the minimum value of Z scale

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.WireframeMaterialProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.WireframeMaterial
member.summary: Gets or sets the material used for rendering the series wireframe.
member.remarks: The wireframe will only be seen when WireframeThickness is set to a value greater than zero.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.WireframeThicknessProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.WireframeThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the thickness used for rendering the series wireframe.
member.remarks: This property value is relative to the size of the surface chart. Sensible values for wireframe thickness are between 0 and 0.01.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.XMemberPathProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.XMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets name of the member on each item in the ItemsSource which should be translated to the X location of the corresponding data point.

member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamScatterSurface3D.YMemberPath

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.Chart3D.ActualAspect
member.summary: Gets current aspect ratio of the surface chart, calculated from the setting of the Aspect property and/or the actual size of the control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.Chart3D.Rotation
member.summary: Gets or sets the rotation for the surface chart.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.Chart3D.Aspect
member.summary: Gets or sets 3-dimensional vector specifying the aspect ratio of X, Y, and Z dimensions in the the surface chart.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.Chart3D.LightDirection
member.summary: Gets or sets 3-dimensional vector specifying the direction of a directional light which lights the series surface and surface projection on the floor of chart cube.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.Chart3D.LightIntensityPropertyName
member.summary: Identifies the name of the Lighting dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.Chart3D.LightIntensity
member.summary: Gets or sets the lighting intensity for the series surface and surface projection on the floor of chart cube.
member.remarks: Valid values for this property are between 0 and 1

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.Chart3D.ActualXAxis
member.summary: Gets the X-axis being used by this chart.
member.remarks: This property will return the value of the XAxis property. If the XAxis property is not set, it will return the Axis object being used as the default X-axis.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.Chart3D.ActualYAxis
member.summary: Gets the Y-axis being used by this chart.
member.remarks: This property will return the value of the YAxis property. If the YAxis property is not set, it will return the Axis object being used as the default Y-axis.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.Chart3D.ActualZAxis
member.summary: Gets the Z-axis being used by this chart.
member.remarks: This property will return the value of the ZAxis property. If the ZAxis property is not set, it will return the Axis object being used as the default Z-axis.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.Chart3D.Scale
member.summary: Gets or sets the scale used for zooming the view in or out from the surface chart.
member.remarks: This is a value relative to the size of the control. A value of 1 would cause the surface cube to occupy 100% of the space available in the control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.Chart3D.CrosshairBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the a brush used for rendering crosshair lines

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.Chart3D.CrosshairThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the thickness for rendering crosshair lines.
member.remarks: This is a value relative to the size of the surface chart.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.Chart3D.CubeMaterial
member.summary: Gets or sets the material for rendering cube sides

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.ScatterSurface3D.OnPropertyUpdated(System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Method called when certain properties are changed on this surface chart object.
member.remarks: This method will raise the PropertyChanged event.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.ScatterSurface3D.SeriesColors
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of colors to use in coloring series surface of the chart.
member.remarks: Note that SeriesColors are not used if SeriesMaterial is specified on this control

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.ScatterSurface3D.SeriesColorInterpolation
member.summary: Gets or sets mode for selecting colors from the SeriesColors.
member.remarks: Note color interpolation is not used if SeriesMaterial is specified on this control

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.ScatterSurface3D.SeriesMaterial
member.summary: Gets or sets material used for rendering the series mesh.
member.remarks: Note that SeriesMaterial takes precedence over value specified in SeriesColors

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.ScatterSurface3D.FloorMaterial
member.summary: Gets or sets material to use for the 3-dimensional model projected onto the floor of the surface chart at the minimum of Z axis.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.ScatterSurface3D.ActualSeriesMaterial
member.summary: Gets actual series material used in the series mesh.
member.remarks: This property will return a Material which is a composite of the SeriesMaterial or SeriesColors, along with some default materials applied by the surface chart.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.ScatterSurface3D.WireframeMaterial
member.summary: Gets or sets the material used for rendering the series wireframe.
member.remarks: The wireframe will only be seen when WireframeThickness is set to a value greater than zero.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.ScatterSurface3D.WireframeThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the thickness used for rendering the series wireframe.
member.remarks: This property value is relative to the size of the surface chart. Sensible values for wireframe thickness are between 0 and 0.01.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.ScatterSurface3D.ShowFloorProjection
member.summary: Gets or sets the whether or not to show a 2-dimensional projection of the series mesh on the floor of the cube, at the minimum value of Z scale

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.ScatterSurface3D.SamplingThreshold
member.summary:
Gets or sets the maximum points which the surface chart will allow to render in the series mesh.
If the count of items in the ItemsSource exceeds MaximumPoints, then sampling will be turned on, and the points will be consolidated into a regular grid with Sqrt(MaximumPoints) rows and Sqrt(MaximumPoints) columns.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.ScatterSurface3D.NormalizeTriangulation
member.summary: Determines whether to normalize XY values before sending them to triangulation.
member.remarks: XY values with dissimilar magnitude can have an undesirable effect on triangulation. Set this property to true to normalize all x and y values using the formula (x(i) - xMin) / (xMax - xMin).

member.name: T:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.SeriesColorPaletteInterpolation
member.summary: Enum for modes of color palette interpolation available in the surface chart.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.SeriesColorPaletteInterpolation.None
member.summary: Select a color from the palette; do not interpolate between colors.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.SeriesColorPaletteInterpolation.ARGB
member.summary: Interpolate between colors using ARGB color interpolation.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.SeriesColorPaletteInterpolation.AHSV
member.summary: Interpolate between colors using AHSV color interpolation.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.ColorCollection
member.summary: Represents a collection of colors

member.name: T:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.LinearAxis
member.summary: Represents linear numeric scale in a surface chart

member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum value where this scale starts.

member.summary: Identifies the ActualMinimumValue dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.LinearAxis.MaximumValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum value where this scale ends.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.LinearAxis.MaximumValueProperty
member.summary: Identifies the ActualMaximumValue dependency property.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.LinearAxis.GetScaledValue(System.Double)
member.summary: Converts a data value to a scale position.
member.param: The data value to convert to a scale position.
member.returns: The given value, converted to a scale position.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.LinearAxis.GetUnscaledValue(System.Double)
member.summary: Converts a scale position to a data value.
member.param: The scale position to convert to a data value.
member.returns: The given scale position, converted to a data value.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.LinearAxis.DoAutoRange
member.summary: Calculates the range for this scale based on the setting of the MinimumValue and MaximumValue properties, and sets the ActualMinimumValue and ActualMaximumValue properties accordingly.
member.returns: True if the range changed, otherwise False.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.LinearAxis.OnPropertyChanged(System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Notifies about changes to certain property values by raising the PropertyChanged event.

member.summary: Identifies the Interval dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.LinearAxis.Interval
member.summary: Gets or sets an interval at which to render labels and gridlines along the scale.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.LinearAxis.TickmarkMinimumValueProperty
member.summary: Identifies the TickmarkMinimumValue dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.LinearAxis.TickmarkMinimumValue
member.summary: Gets or sets numeric value at which labels and gridlines start on this scale
member.remarks: Not to be confused with the MinimumValue property, which defines where the scale begins, independent of tickmarks.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.LinearAxis.TickmarkMaximumValueProperty
member.summary: Identifies the TickmarkMaximumValue dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.LinearAxis.TickmarkMaximumValue
member.summary: Gets or sets numeric value at which labels and gridlines end on this scale
member.remarks: Not to be confused with the MaximumValue property, which defines where the scale ends, independent of tickmarks.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.LinearAxis.MajorValues
member.summary: Gets the numbers at which labels and tickmarks should be rendered along this scale.
member.returns: An enumerable set of numbers at which labels and tickmarks should be rendered.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.LinearAxis.GetInterval
member.summary: Gets the interval at which labels and gridlines should be spaced along the scale.
member.returns: The interval at which to render labels and gridlines along the scale.
member.remarks: If the Interval property is set to a valid value, this function will return the value of the Interval property. Otherwise, this function will calculate an ideal interval based on ActualMinimumValue and ActualMaximumValue.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.LogarithmicAxis

member.summary: Calculates the range for this scale based on the setting of the MinimumValue and MaximumValue properties, and sets the ActualMinimumValue and ActualMaximumValue properties accordingly.

member.summary: Gets or sets the format string for labels on this scale.
member.remarks: This can be a string in the format {0} or {0:n}, following the .NET standards for numeric format strings.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value corresponding to actual end of this scale.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether this scale should be oriented backwards, running from ActualMaximumValue to ActualMinimumValue.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.SurfaceChartAxis.LabelOffsetProperty
member.summary: Identifies the LabelOffset dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.SurfaceChartAxis.LabelOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the distance to offset the labels away from the edge of the cube.
member.remarks: This is a value relative to the size of the chart cube, where 1 is the entire span of the cube. A typical value for LabelOffset is 0.02.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.SurfaceChartAxis.TitleOffsetProperty
member.summary: Identifies the TitleOffset dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.SurfaceChartAxis.TitleOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the distance to offset the title away from the edge of the cube.
member.remarks: This is a value relative to the size of the chart cube, where 1 is the entire span of the cube. A typical value for TitleOffset is 0.02.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.SurfaceChartAxis.CrossingValueProperty
member.summary: Identifies the CrossingValue dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.SurfaceChartAxis.CrossingValue
member.summary: Gets or sets a value on the adjacent axis at which this axis line should cross.
member.remarks: Each axis in a 3D chart can render 4 lines, 2 for each adjacent axis. If CrossingValue is set to double.NaN, the lines will be rendered along the edges of the cube.

member.summary: Class for contextual information about a mouse hit in a ScatterSurface3D.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.PickResult.Hit
member.summary: True if a mouse hit occurred, otherwise False.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.PickResult.HitPoint
member.summary: The mouse hit point, in data value coordinates.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.SurfaceChart3DMouseHit
member.summary: Class for holding contextual information about a mouse hit in a surface chart.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.SurfaceChart3DMouseHit.HitScaled
member.summary: The hit location, expressed in chart coordinates.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.SurfaceChart3DMouseHit.HitUnscaled
member.summary: The hit location, expressed in data value coordinates.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.SurfaceChart3DMouseHit.Item
member.summary: The data item, if any, in context.
member.remarks: This property will return null unless the hit element is a point marker.
